body_html:
I have only 10 minutes to do something about it, and this is what I found.
In the middle of a method in applications_helper, user becomes nil.
I can do a quick fix like this:
Add if user.present? to
link_to(user.name.present? ? user.name : user.github_handle, user, class: attendance.confirmed? ? 'confirmed' : '')

I checked locally, and it will show the Conferences list.
Would this help for now?

body:
I have only 10 minutes to do something about it, and this is what I found.
In the [middle of a method in applications_helper](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/blob/master/app/helpers/application_helper.rb#L129), `user` becomes `nil`.
I can do a quick fix like this:
Add `if user.present?` to 
`link_to(user.name.present? ? user.name : user.github_handle, user, class: attendance.confirmed? ? 'confirmed' : '')`

I checked locally, and it will show the Conferences list.
Would this help for now?
